title: Letters and memorials of Jane Welsh Carlyle.
author: Carlyle, Jane Welsh
snippet: We called for the Bains last night and invited them to tea tonight,  which they thankfully accepted.

title: Letters and memorials of Jane Welsh Carlyle.
author: Carlyle, Jane Welsh
snippet: I found the Bains; and saw Mrs. George s before she left.

title: Letters and memorials of Jane Welsh Carlyle.
author: Carlyle, Jane Welsh
snippet: I am going to seek out the Bains after church.
